rows.label: qev025301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Need something? Well, too bad, because none of these
are operational right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Some of the new BLADEs did a real number on 'em,
and now I get to pick up the pieces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0003
rows.name:
These kids got no love, I tell you. Think this is some
video game where they can wreck their ride and have
it fixed tomorrow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0004
rows.name:
We're not freakin' wizards here, you know? It takes
materials to patch up a Skell, not to mention labor
and technical know-how.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0005
rows.name:
You're a BLADE too, right? I figure cleaning up your
coworkers' messes is part of your job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0006
rows.name: Any interest in helping me out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0007
rows.name: It's nothing too tricky, I promise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0008
rows.name: I just need 40 pieces of arnacian orewood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0009
rows.name:
If you get 'em, I can have these repairs done quick.
Maybe not overnight, but I'll do what I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_JNK0010
rows.name: Volunteer

rows.label: qev025301_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer to gather the arnacian orewood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev025301_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Matthew that BLADEs have to
be responsible for themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0010
rows.name: That's what I like to hear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0011
rows.name: You're a credit to the BLADEs. You'll go far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0012
rows.name: What, too busy to help a guy out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Or maybe you just don't think you could get 40
pieces of arnacian orewood. Maybe that's it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0014
rows.name:
You can't tell me someone like you isn't up to the task.
C'mon, this is kid's stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Okay, look. Jokes aside, I really need the help.
If my tone turned you off, I apologize.
So what do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0016
rows.name: Much appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0017
rows.name:
Once you've got 40 pieces of arnacian orewood,
bring it by. As far as a reward, let's see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0018
rows.name: May I interject, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0019
rows.name: Do you have to, Aganeba?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0020
rows.name:
You, uh, mentioned Skell repairs, didn't you?
You're talking about the plating refit for the one
brought in yesterday, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0021
rows.name: Yeah. And?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Then 40 pieces of arnacian orewood is inefficient,
isn't it? One noka mirrorstone is all you need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Things like this are why you humans keep falling behind
as technology advances, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0024
rows.name: Watch your mouth, pip-squeak![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0025
rows.name:
If you bring it to the Ma-non ship, I'll refine it into
all the materials required for the repairs, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Then you can witness the workings of of of true science,
can't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0027
rows.name: Ha! You're on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0028
rows.name:
I can't wait to see you turn one noka mirrorstone into
an entire job's worth of materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0029
rows.name:
Once you find a noka mirrorstone, bring it to the
Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'm not buying that they can turn that into a whole
repair job's worth of materials until I see it for myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0031
rows.name: Ah, you're back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0032
rows.name: And here comes Aganeba...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Yes, hello. I suspect that the materials are too much for
human hands to manage, right? So so I came by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0034
rows.name: Yeah, I just bet... *grumble*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0035
rows.name: So where are all these materials you Ma-non refined?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0036
rows.name: Ah, these them? Let's just see how...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0037
rows.name: Wait. This is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0038
rows.name: But that's not... Hold on here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0039
rows.name:
Oh, THAT's how it works! Damn, man!
That's actually pretty clever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0040
rows.name: Oh, sorry. Kind of nerded out for a minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0041
rows.name:
Still, these materials are impressive. They've been refined
using a process we never even thought about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0042
rows.name:
I can see how these would be a cinch to work with,
and the results should be better than ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0043
rows.name: Amazing stuff... Guess you Ma-non win this round.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0044
rows.name:
Er, yes? Obviously? Perhaps you won't be so quick to,
um, doubt us in the future, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0045
rows.name:
Ma-non technology is the finest in all the universe,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0046
rows.name: So will you share this refinement process with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0047
rows.name:
This technology would mean a drastic uptick in our
efficiency.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0048
rows.name:
What? Er, um, no? No. No no.
I'm sorry, but that's probably not possible, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0049
rows.name: Why not?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0050
rows.name:
Because teaching is such a pain in the... Er, because
that's proprietary Ma-non science, yes? Yes. That's it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0051
rows.name: I can't go giving it away, can I now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0052
rows.name: So so sorry, but my decision is final, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0053
rows.name:
That little fink... Here I swallow my pride and admit
defeat, and how's he respond?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0054
rows.name:
Hey, you BLADEs are old hat at negotiating with other
races, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0055
rows.name:
Think you could try persuading him to share that tech
with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0056
rows.name:
Not for free, of course. I intend to pay them a fair
price for the information.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0057
rows.name:
You've already come this far, so why not see it through
to the end, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0058
rows.name: I've got a mountain of busted Skells that need fixing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0059
rows.name:
And we're never going to keep up with demand without
that Ma-non technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025301_MSG0060
rows.name:
Drag the secret of how to refine this stuff out of
Aganeba any way you can. And thanks![ST:wait ]
